explanation: [0-0] Beside a street stall, a vendor in brightly colored clothing, wearing a transparent glove on their left hand, holds an apple. Their right hand holds a knife against the apple. On the glass counter to the right, there is a silver tray, and inside the cabinet, various fruits are placed. To the right stands a person wearing a khaki top, black pants, and a blue apron with their back to the camera.

[0-9] The vendor first cuts off the label from the apple, then turns the apple with their left hand, skillfully slicing it into thin pieces. The sliced apple pieces fall into a metal tray on the stall. The person wearing the blue apron walks to the left, where other people are walking.
